data.comment: The match is underway in Porto.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 1, Yusupha Njie (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 3, Braga's Paulinho attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Paulinho.
In the minute 4, Great play from Fransergio to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 8, Andre Narciso signals a Braga throw-in in Boavista's half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Braga are whistled for offside.
Goal! Iuri Medeiros extends Braga's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 17, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Alberth Elis (Boavista) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Boavista.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
In the minute 20, Boavista are coming forward and Cristian Devenish gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Braga push upfield but Andre Narciso quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 21, Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Boavista.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 25, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Braga extend their lead to 0-3 through Ricardo Horta.
In the minute 26, Nuno Sequeira with an assist there.
Braga to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 29, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 31, Braga's Ricardo Horta gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Braga's Ricardo Horta goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Andre Narciso signals a throw-in for Boavista, close to Braga's area.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Boavista in the half of Braga.
In Porto, Boavista push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In Porto Boavista drive forward through Paulinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Boavista.
In the minute 36, Andre Narciso awards the home team a throw-in.
Boavista's Show breaks free at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Andre Narciso awards Braga a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fransergio (Braga) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Boavista have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Boavista.
Andre Narciso signals a Braga throw-in in Boavista's half.
Angel Gomes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Boavista.
In the minute 43, Boavista are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Porto Boavista attack through Angel Gomes. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 44, Free kick Braga.
Yusupha Njie for Boavista drives towards goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ricardo Horta for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Jesualdo Ferreira (Boavista) is making a first substitution, with Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez replacing Nuno Valente Santos.
In the minute 46, Ricardo Mangas is replacing Yusupha Njie for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Andre Narciso waits before resuming play because Nuno Sequeira for Braga is still down.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nuno Sequeira (Braga) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Ze Carlos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Boavista.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
Boavista's Alberth Elis gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Braga defender.
In the minute 54, Braga needs to be cautious. Boavista have an attacking throw-in.
Can Boavista capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Boavista.
In the minute 56, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Braga are caught offside.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
In the minute 62, Free kick Braga.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI, Braga are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nathan is on a sub for Reggie Cannon for Boavista.
In the minute 66, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
In the minute 66, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Cristian Devenish (Boavista) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-3.
That's a fine assist from Yanis Hamache.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 67, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI, Al Musrati has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ricardo Horta puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-4.
Paulinho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Braga's Paulinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 73, Boavista are pushing forward but Alberth Elis's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Braga have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Braga.
Alberth Elis (Boavista) strikes at Estadio do Bessa XXI but his header is cleared.
In the minute 75, Jesualdo Ferreira is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Sebastian Perez replacing Show.
In the minute 76, Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez of Boavista gets in a strike, but is off target.
Andre Narciso awards Braga a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Iuri Medeiros with Nico Gaitan. This is the second substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
In the minute 77, Andre Horta is replacing Joao Novais for Braga at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Andre Narciso awards the home team a throw-in.
Jesualdo Ferreira (Boavista) is making a fifth substitution, with Morais replacing Yanis Hamache.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Braga.
Braga's Paulinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 81, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Boavista.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Boavista's Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez has been booked in Porto.
In the minute 82, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a Boavista throw-in in Braga's half.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Boavista advance rapidly upfield but Andre Narciso blows for offside.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 85, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Boavista.
Ricardo Horta of Braga smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Braga have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Braga.
Boavista drive upfield and Alberth Elis gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Braga defender.
Ricardo Mangas for Boavista drives towards goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-4.
Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Abel Ruiz replacing Ricardo Horta.
The away team have replaced Raul Silva with Bruno Rodrigues. This is the fifth substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
